<xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/publiclighting/devicemonitoring/2014/10" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:common="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10" xmlns:tns="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/publiclighting/devicemonitoring/2014/10"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10" schemaLocation="common.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="GetPowerUsageHistoryRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="TimePeriod" type="tns:TimePeriod"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="HistoryTermType" type="tns:HistoryTermType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="scheduled_time" type="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetPowerUsageHistoryAsyncResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncResponse" type="common:AsyncResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetPowerUsageHistoryAsyncRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncRequest" type="common:AsyncRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetPowerUsageHistoryResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="Result" type="common:OsgpResultType"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="400" minOccurs="1" name="PowerUsageData" type="tns:PowerUsageData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetActualPowerUsageRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="DeviceIdentification" type="common:Identification"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetActualPowerUsageAsyncResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncResponse" type="common:AsyncResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetActualPowerUsageAsyncRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AsyncRequest" type="common:AsyncRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GetActualPowerUsageResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="Result" type="common:OsgpResultType"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="PowerUsageData" type="tns:PowerUsageData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="TimePeriod"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="StartTime" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="EndTime" type="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="HistoryTermType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SHORT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LONG"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MeterType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="P1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PULSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AUX"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="PowerUsageData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="RecordTime" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="MeterType" type="tns:MeterType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="TotalConsumedEnergy" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ActualConsumedPower" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="PsldData" type="tns:PsldData"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="SsldData" type="tns:SsldData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PsldData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="TotalLightingHours" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SsldData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="actualCurrent1" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="actualCurrent2" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="actualCurrent3" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="actualPower1" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="actualPower2" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="actualPower3" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="averagePowerFactor1" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="averagePowerFactor2" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="averagePowerFactor3" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="relayData" type="tns:RelayData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RelayData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="index" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="totalLightingMinutes" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.opensmartgridplatform.org/schemas/common/2014/10"> <xsd:element name="OrganisationIdentification" type="tns:Identification"/> <xsd:element name="UserName" type="tns:Identification"/> <xsd:element name="ApplicationName" type="tns:Identification"/> <xsd:simpleType name="Identification"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^ ]{0,40}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="Page"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="TotalPages" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="PageSize" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="CurrentPage" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CorrelationUid"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:minLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="AsyncRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="CorrelationUid" type="tns:CorrelationUid"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="DeviceId" type="tns:Identification"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AsyncResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="CorrelationUid" type="tns:CorrelationUid"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="DeviceId" type="tns:Identification"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OsgpResultType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="OK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT FOUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT OK"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="FunctionalFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Code" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Component" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="InnerException" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="InnerMessage" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TechnicalFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Component" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="InnerException" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="InnerMessage" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>
